info.kapable.utils.owanotifier.notification.manager

Class SimpleManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.notification.NotificationManager
      • info.kapable.utils.owanotifier.notification.manager.SimpleManager

  • public class SimpleManager
extends NotificationManager
    Simply displays new Notifications in one corner of the screen on top of each other. Has an option for fading (note - results will vary across different platforms).
